title: Impact Hub Dhaka
mission: We inspire and enable entrepreneurs and organisations to be more impact driven and sustainable.
tagline: Creating a Bangladesh where everyone thrives
description: A locally rooted, globally connected innovation lab, Impact Hub Dhaka offers a unique ecosystem of resources, collaborative workspace, community-led events, diverse global network, entrepreneurship programs and consulting services to help individuals to bring sustainable solutions that create impact and drive change.

title: YY Studios
description: YY Studios is a creative design studio comprising vibrant and passionate minds who are focussed on amplifying the message of impact driven organizations at home and around the world through expressive and striking designs and much more. Starting from brand identity design and consulting to website design and development and creative campaign management, YY Studios’s take on your brand will splash imagination and inspiration at every sphere.

title: YY Goshti
tagline: Rapid, intense and immersive education for social businesses
description: YY Goshti offers an intense, rapid, and immersive education to accelerate the life cycle of innovative social businesses. The four month long program is designed by social business leaders and investors to help early stage social entrepreneurs with the support required to launch their minimum viable product and raise the needed seed capital.

title: Avijatrik Tourism
mission: To work hand in hand with local people to promote ‘community-based tourism’ to provide travelers with an authentic and meaningful experience and to contribute to the preservation of culture and nature while bringing economic opportunities for sustainable livelihoods to local communities.
tagline: Largest Travel Company & Tourism Marketplace in Bangladesh
description: Avijatrik is an online touring platform to provide adventurous holiday experiences in a different region of Bangladesh. Besides, providing traditional tourism services we provide exclusive community-based tourism services in Bangladesh.

title: Shishir Water
mission: We find, enable and invest in community based water projects started and managed by young entrepreneurs in Bangladesh.
description: Shishir is a clean drinking water solution working to serve the underserved population of Bangladesh at an affordable price so that they can continuously avail it and in an environment friendly way so that there are no negative impacts on nature or the beneficiaries.

title: Amarlab
mission: AmarLab aims to build a world where everyone can easily access quality healthcare at an affordable price.
description: AmarLab is an at-home-at-work pathology test service bridging the gap between patients and diagnostic centers of their choice. Due to road traffic, old age, physical impediment and busy work life, seeking healthcare has become challenging for many. With the aim to make healthcare more accessible, AmarLab works to eliminate the obstacles that keep people from ensuring this basic medical need.

title: Garbageman
description: GARBAGEMAN is the first ict tech-based organization focused on recycling in Bangladesh. Through a scientific approach towards waste management system, GARBAGEMAN aims to create a cleaner and greener Bangladesh by transforming waste into reusable products.
